description: Create a customer incident default assignee
permissions: User must be allowed to update the related customer (CustomerPolicy update?).
side_effects: Creates a customer incident default assignee record.
validation_notes: customer, default-assignee, and kind are required. kind must be a valid incident kind and is unique per customer. default-assignee must be an admin or have a membership with the customer or the customer broker.

flags.name: --customer
flags.validation: Must be a valid customer ID.

flags.name: --default-assignee
flags.description: User ID for the default assignee (required)
flags.validation: Must be a valid user ID with a relationship to the customer (admin, customer member, or broker member).

flags.name: --kind
flags.validation: One of: equipment, plant, trucking, crew, safety, quality, weather, traffic, capacity, job_site_condition, planning, near_miss, property_damage, personal_injury, over_trucking, good_catch, damage, overloading, subcontractor_delay, mobilization, accident_notification_and_assistance, theft, vandalism, vehicle_incident, work_zone_intrusion.
